content: very easy cute little bunny with his carrot if you like him don t forget to check his other cube family friends in my blog if you enjoy my free patterns and would like to support me to continue making them feel free to buy me a ball of yarn or a cup of coffee by following the link 1 if you cannot don t worry i will still do my best to create free patterns all the same subscribe 2 to my blog 3 to get updates every time i publish a new pattern or tutorial you can also follow me on instagram 4 to watch the daily adventures of my critters please use #craftybunnybun 5 to tag your work i create these patterns because i enjoy seeing your recreations of them 1 https //ko-fi com/t6t4o289 2 https //www craftybunnybun com/subscribe-to-craftybunnybun 3 https //www craftybunnybun com/ 4 https //www instagram com/craftybunnybun/ 5 https //www instagram com/explore/tags/craftybunnybun/
